welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Takaishi, Japan! Known for its charming temples and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's beauty and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
